languages.text: {n}Удар приходится по треснувшему сегменту брони, и из глубин механизма доносится влажный, рокочущий вой, который легко спутать с болезненным стоном. Конечности испуганно подгибаются и втягиваются под брюхо.{/n}

{n}The impact lands on a cracked armour segment, and a wet, rumbling howl erupts from the guts of the mechanism, a sound that could easily be confused with a painful groan. The monster's limbs twitch in fear and retract under its belly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Удар приходится по треснувшему сегменту брони, и из глубин механизма доносится влажный, рокочущий вой, который легко спутать с болезненным стоном. Конечности испуганно подгибаются и втягиваются под брюхо.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その衝撃は、ひび割れたアーマー・セグメントに届き、痛々しいうめき声と見紛うような、湿った、ごうごうとした遠吠えがメカニズムの内臓から噴出する。怪物四肢は恐怖で痙攣し、腹の下に引っ込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The impact lands on a cracked armour segment, and a wet, rumbling howl erupts from the guts of the mechanism, a sound that could easily be confused with a painful groan. The monster's limbs twitch in fear and retract under its belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その衝撃は、ひび割れたアーマー・セグメントに届き、痛々しいうめき声と見紛うような、湿った、ごうごうとした遠吠えがメカニズムの内臓から噴出する。怪物四肢は恐怖で痙攣し、腹の下に引っ込む。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你猛地一脚踢开了破裂的装甲，机械内部爆发出了一阵阴沉的轰鸣，听起来像是痛苦的呻吟。这只怪物惊恐地抽搐着，将四肢折回了肚子下面。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The impact lands on a cracked armour segment, and a wet, rumbling howl erupts from the guts of the mechanism, a sound that could easily be confused with a painful groan. The monster's limbs twitch in fear and retract under its belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你猛地一脚踢开了破裂的装甲，机械内部爆发出了一阵阴沉的轰鸣，听起来像是痛苦的呻吟。这只怪物惊恐地抽搐着，将四肢折回了肚子下面。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El impacto cae sobre un segmento de armadura agrietado y de las tripas del mecanismo brota un sonido retumbante que podría confundirse fácilmente con un gemido de dolor. Las extremidades del monstruo se retuercen de miedo y se retraen bajo su vientre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The impact lands on a cracked armour segment, and a wet, rumbling howl erupts from the guts of the mechanism, a sound that could easily be confused with a painful groan. The monster's limbs twitch in fear and retract under its belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El impacto cae sobre un segmento de armadura agrietado y de las tripas del mecanismo brota un sonido retumbante que puede confundirse fácilmente con un gemido de dolor. Las extremidades se retuercen de miedo y se retraen bajo el vientre del monstruo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Treffer landet auf einem angeknacksten Panzerungssegment, und ein nasses, grollendes Heulen ertönt aus dem Inneren des Mechanismus ... ein Geräusch, das man leicht für ein schmerzverzerrtes Stöhnen halten könnte. Die Gliedmaßen des Monsters zucken verängstigt und ziehen sich unter seinen Bauch zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The impact lands on a cracked armour segment, and a wet, rumbling howl erupts from the guts of the mechanism, a sound that could easily be confused with a painful groan. The monster's limbs twitch in fear and retract under its belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Treffer landet auf einem angeknacksten Panzerungssegment, und ein nasses, grollendes Heulen ertönt aus dem Inneren des Mechanismus. Man kann das Geräusch leicht für ein schmerzverzerrtes Stöhnen halten. Die Gliedmaßen zucken verängstigt zusammen und ziehen sich unter den Bauch des Monsters zurück.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre coup atterrit pile sur un segment fendu de son armure, suscitant dans ses entrailles un étrange son qui pourrait aisément être confondu avec un grognement de douleur et faisant tressaillir les appendices du monstre qui se rétractent sous son ventre, visiblement apeurés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The impact lands on a cracked armour segment, and a wet, rumbling howl erupts from the guts of the mechanism, a sound that could easily be confused with a painful groan. The monster's limbs twitch in fear and retract under its belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre coup atterrit pile sur un segment fendu de son armure, suscitant dans ses entrailles un étrange gargouillement qui pourrait être confondu avec un grognement de douleur et faisant tressaillir ses appendices qui se rétractent sous son ventre, visiblement apeurés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Darbe, çatlamış bir zırh segmentine denk geliyor. Sonrasında mekanizmanın midesinden acılı bir inilti olarak yorumlanabilecek, ıslak, şiddetli bir uğultu yükseliyor. Canavarın uzuvları korkuyla seğirip karnının altına kapanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The impact lands on a cracked armour segment, and a wet, rumbling howl erupts from the guts of the mechanism, a sound that could easily be confused with a painful groan. The monster's limbs twitch in fear and retract under its belly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Darbe, çatlamış bir zırh segmentine denk geliyor ve mekanizmanın midesinden ıslak, yüksek sesli bir uğultu yükseliyor. Acılı bir inilti olarak rahatlıkla yorumlanabilecek bir ses. Canavarın uzuvları korkuyla seğiriyor ve karnının altına kapanıyor.{/n}
